Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • calwfp - Run the WF/PC calibration code on an input image.
  • checkwfpc - Perform consistency checks on a WF/PC reference file.
  • combine - Combine images using various algorithms & pixel rejection schemes
  • crrej - Combine images to make a cosmic ray free image
  • dqfpar @ Select DQF error flags (pset).
  • engextr - Extract info. from WF/PC engineering data (.X0H and .X0D) files
  • metric - Translate WFPC pixel coordinates to RA & Dec with geometric
  • corrections.
  • noisemodel - Determine noise model parameters from CCD frames.
  • noisepar @ Set parameters describing noise model (pset).
  • pixcoord - Compute pixel coordinates of stars in an image.
  • qwmosaic - Quick mosaic of the four WFPC frames into one image.
  • seam - Smooth the boundaries between mosaicked WFPC frames.
  • u_calib + Tasks for deriving the WFPC-2 instrument calibration.
  • w_calib + Tasks for deriving the WFPC instrument calibration.
  • wfixup - Interpolate over bad columns in a WFPC frame.
  • wmosaic - Mosaic the four WFPC frames into one image
  • wstatistics - Compute & print WFPC image pixel statistics.

  • (Type "help wfpc option=sysdoc" for detailed information about the `wfpc'
  • package).
